title: Bulgaria launches new national plan to end antibiotic resistance emergency [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Bulgaria has launched a new four-year AMR national plan to achieve an 18% reduction in total antibiotic use - prescription enforcement and hospital oversight are central dynamics
summary_public: Bulgaria has launched a new four-year AMR national plan to achieve an 18% reduction in total antibiotic use - prescription enforcement and hospital oversight are central dynamics

BG.label: positive
BG.evidence: Bulgaria launches new national plan to end antibiotic resistance
